RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 6. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE DRAKE trailed down the backstretch, swung wide, closed with a rush five wide and was along in time. NO BANG NO BOOM (IRE) stalked the pace into the turn, rallied three wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch then couldn't hold off the winner. JOHNNY U prompted the pace two wide and finished with good courage. ICONIC inside for a half, altered course four wide at the top of the stretch and finished determinedly. DAD'S YANKEES away alertly, set the pace along the inside for a little over a half then was outfinished. REINSURE failed to menace. BULLION was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: The Drake
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rallied 5 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Iconic
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, altered course 4 wide top lane, determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: No Bang No Boom (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, led late, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Dad's Yankees
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace top lane, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOMMA K'S BOY rushed to a clear lead past the half mile pole, widened on the turn, set the balance of the pace and lasted under left handed urging. VILLIAN was fractious in the gate, chased the winner and was steadily gaining ground late two wide in a determined effort. JODHPUR failed to menace. GUESS AGAIN was hustled from the start, within striking distance into the stretch then gave way. RIVERS OF DENIRO trailed. PER HISA RULING DATED 07/11/2023, MOMMA K'S BOY WAS DQ'D DUE TO A CROP VIOLATION.

ENTRY.NAME: Guess Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, close inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Jodhpur
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Momma K's Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed clear, set pace, lasted, left handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Villian
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hamm Shane
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, chased, gaining, 2 wide, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Rivers of Deniro
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 40100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming RacesFor $12, 500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPARKLING JEWEL stalked the pace along the inside into the turn, shifted out, surged two wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch, drifted when put to strong urging and drew off. EMERSON JONES away alertly, set the pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner. THE DEVIL'S DREAM raced outside five wide down the backstretch then three wide through the turn and outfinished others in the four path. NICEASAKITTENSEYES offered a mild bid along the rail into the stretch then leveled off. BOSSY LADY chased the pace two wide for a half then gave way. APPEALING SENORITA well placed, was through after a half. MOBIL CHIC was no factor. ANGEL WINGS was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkling Jewel
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, angled out turn, took charge top lane, drifted, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStar Farm LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Emerson Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace top lane, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: The Devil's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide backstretch, 3 wide turn, outfinished others

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAP TO MY HEART away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide, shook clear in hand on the turn, dropped inside then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while being kept to task. DOMINUS O'S ME trailed into the stretch, rallied determinedly in the four path and finished well clear for second. ROLLIN RAVEN had good early speed along the inside then in the stretch. PENNY'S TREASURE failed to menace. COUNTRY STYLE pressed the early pace three wide and gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Dominus O's Me
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia

ENTRY.NAME: Map to My Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2 wide, drew off turn, much best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Peter J Sheppell & Bradley G Buchholtz

ENTRY.NAME: Country Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide gave way turn,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 55. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or LessNot Cons idered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIER ONE never far back, closed with a burst of speed along rail rail under right then left handed urging and got up in the final strides. K KID with the second flight three wide, rallied determinedly in the five path and just missed. FAST AS FAST CAN B bumped at the start, set the pace in the three path, shook clear on the turn then weakened in deep stretch. YOU'RE OUT bumped at the start and failed to menace. GOOD MUSIC was no threat. CONSTITUTION COAL chased the early pace along the inside and was through after a half. SWING STATE passed tiring rivals. RAY'S EMPIRE was no factor. MAN'S CHOICE was outrun. SOL DEL NORTE was through early. PER THE HORSE RACING INTEGRITY AND WELFARE UNIT, TIER ONE HAS BEEN DQ'D DUE TO A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: K Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, rallied 5path, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Fast as Fast Can B
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, set pace, shook clear, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Tier One
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed fast rail, up in final strides,
